name: Space Painter
description:
Travel from planet to planet painting the landscape and world around you!

http://reflextionsdev.com

https://twitter.com/ReflextionsOfic

Controls:

A: Move Left

D: Move RIght

W: Jump

S: Crouch

This is an old project I did in high-school so I won't be maintaining or updating it, but I figured some people might find it fun.
